channel.title: Need urgent help? ...Visit Dean's Help Thread
channel.description:
[img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img] Dean's Help Thread [font=impact][u]Online![/u][/font] [img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img][img alt=*]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/star.gif[/img]
[u][i][b]Always check if the thread is online/offline.[/b][/i][/u]
[font=arial]Resources you should suggest using before you post here:[/font] www.moparisthebest.com www.rspscodes.synthasite.com www.google.com
[size=14pt][font=Arial]No one replying to your help request? [/font][/size]
[font=arial][size=18pt]Rules[/size][/font]
You post what you need help on here. Nothing else! You can't comment just if you need help! Provide a link to your help thread. Once your problem is solved, edit your post and write [b]Solved[/b].
Use this format:
[code]Username: Help thread link: What Source are you using? Need help on?[/code]
Examples:
[b]Before:[/b]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/ac5yu0.png[/img]
[b]After:[/b]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/b9hdhy.png[/img]

item.title: Need urgent help? ...Visit Dean's Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Indeed, ‘offering’ help topics have never been allowed, except for the FAQ’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Need urgent help? ...Visit Dean's Help Thread

Nothing else! You can’t comment just if you need help!
